name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goku Ultra Instinct: Epic Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Witness Goku in his ultimate form with this stunning *Ultra Instinct* live wallpaper for Chrome!

Along with the dynamic animation,  quick access to popular site shortcuts, and a real-time date and time display. Immerse yourself in the power of Ultra Instinct while staying organized.
